constituent: re-, door, one, ceiling, flag, large, St. Bernard
heisigStory: The key word signals a "coming back" or return to some place or activity. Its elements: door . . . St. Bernard dog.
koohiiStory1: The St. Bernard dog whining at the door of his master’s house in order to re-enter / re-turn inside.
koohiiStory2: Think about hachiko, the dog waiting at the door of the station, waiting for his master to re-turn.
readingExamples: 戻す (もど.す), 戻る (もど.る)
words:
取り戻す(とりもどす): to take back, to regain
払い戻す(はらいもどす): repay, pay back
戻す(もどす): restore, put back, return
戻る(もどる): return
